com.continuuity.loom.cluster
Class Cluster

java.lang.Object
  com.continuuity.loom.admin.NamedEntity

public final class Cluster
extends NamedEntity

Represents a cluster of machines.

Method Detail

getId

public String getId()
Get the id of the cluster.

Returns:
Id of the cluster.

getOwnerId

public String getOwnerId()
Get the id of the owner of the cluster.

Returns:
Id of the owner of the cluster.

getDescription

public String getDescription()
Get the description of the cluster.

Returns:
Description of the cluster.

getCreateTime

public long getCreateTime()
Get the timestamp in milliseconds of when the cluster was created. Create time refers to when the server began creating the cluster, and not the time when the actual cluster create operation completed.

Returns:
Timestamp in milliseconds of when the cluster was created.

getExpireTime

public long getExpireTime()
Get the timestamp in milliseconds of when the cluster will expire. An expire time of 0 indicates the cluster will never expire.

Returns:
Timestamp in milliseconds of when the cluster will expire, with 0 meaning never.

getNodes

public Set<String> getNodes()
Get the set of node ids in the cluster.

Returns:
Set of node ids in the cluster.

getProvider

public Provider getProvider()
Get the Provider used to create and delete machines for the cluster. It should be noted that this is a copy a provider, meaning it may get out of sync with the current instance of the provider.

Returns:
Provider used to create and delete machines for the cluster.

getClusterTemplate

public ClusterTemplate getClusterTemplate()
Get the ClusterTemplate used with the cluster. It should be noted that the cluster keeps its own copy of the cluster template, so it is possible for the template to get out of sync with the most recent version of the template.

Returns:
Cluster template to be used with the cluster.

getServices

public Set<String> getServices()
Get the names of services placed on the cluster.

Returns:
Set of service names placed on the cluster.

getLatestJobId

public String getLatestJobId()
Get the id of the most recent job performed, or being performed, on the cluster.

Returns:
Id of the most recent job performed, or being performed, on the cluster.

getJobs

public List<String> getJobs()
Get a list of ids for all jobs performed or being performed on the cluster.

Returns:
List of ids for all jobs performed or being performed on the cluster.

addJob

public void addJob(String jobId)
Add a job to the cluster. It will become the most recent job.

Parameters:
jobId - Id of the job to add.

getStatus

public Cluster.Status getStatus()
Get the Cluster.Status of the cluster.

Returns:
Status of the cluster.

getConfig

public com.google.gson.JsonObject getConfig()
Get the cluster config json object.

Returns:
Cluster config json object.

setExpireTime

public void setExpireTime(long expireTime)
Set the expire time of the cluster as a timestamp in milliseconds. An expire time of 0 means the cluster will not expire. Only sets the expire time in this Java object. A separate call must be made to persistently store changes in expiration time.

Parameters:
expireTime - Expire time of the cluster as a timestamp in milliseconds, with 0 meaning no expiration.

setStatus

public void setStatus(Cluster.Status status)
Set the status of the cluster. Only sets the status in this Java object. A separate call must be made to persistently store changes in status.

Parameters:
status - Status of the cluster to set.

setOwnerId

public void setOwnerId(String ownerId)
Set the owner of the cluster. Only sets the owner id in this Java object. A separate call must be made to persistently store changes in owner id.

Parameters:
ownerId - Id of the owner of the cluster.

setProvider

public void setProvider(Provider provider)
Set the provider to use for creating and deleting machines. Only sets the provider in this Java object. A separate call must be made to persistently store changes in provider.

Parameters:
provider - Provider to use for creating and deleting machines.

setClusterTemplate

public void setClusterTemplate(ClusterTemplate clusterTemplate)
Set the cluster template to use for cluster operations. Only sets the template in this Java object. A separate call must be made to persistently store changes in template.

Parameters:
clusterTemplate - Cluster template to use for cluster operations.

setNodes

public void setNodes(Set<String> nodes)
Set the ids of the nodes in the cluster. Only sets the node ids in this Java object. A separate call must be made to persistently store changes in node ids.

Parameters:
nodes - Set of ids of the nodes in the cluster.

setServices

public void setServices(Set<String> services)
Set the names of the services on the cluster. Only sets the services in this Java object. A separate call must be made to persistently store changes in services.

Parameters:
services - Names of services placed on the cluster.
